mod.description:
This mod increases the amount of slots available per page in the Adventure Editor.
You can install versions with either 20 slots, 40 slots or even 60.
WARNING: HIGH RESOLUTIONS RECOMMENDED FOR THIS MOD!!!

component.description:
This will add 20 slots into a page in a 4x5 grid.
Recommended for resolutions 1280x720 and above.

This will add 40 slots into a page in a 4x10 grid.
Recommended for resolutions 1600x900 and above.

This will add 60 slots into a page in a 6x10 grid.
Recommended for resolutions 1920x1080 and above.
